items.title: Cracking series #3: Steam multiplayer
Cracking series #2: Steam games
Cracking series #1: CD protected games
items.content_text:
Hello! Welcome to my first post, im very excited about it so let’s start.
I was playing some videogames when i got curious of how games are cracked, then i downloaded an old game from my childhood… Sonic Adventure DX.
Let’s dig into it. I downloaded the disc version from The Seven Seas website that is blocked for a lot of ISPs, after installing it without the DEVIANCE crack, i go into the game folder and find two .
